outputs.output_descr:
48 Hours Video Fest on HIV/AIDS
1.	Workshop on increasing knowledge on HIV/AIDS held, 
2.	Workshops on scripting, shooting and editing short movies held,
3.	Six short movies produced,
4.	TV promo for 48 hours produced and screened in National Public TV and con-tain HIV/AIDS message and UNAIDS logo;
5.	Brochures distributed,
6.	48 hours Video Fest Organized,
7.	Screening of the Six short movies in ten Youth Centers throughout Kosovo took place. 

International Students Theatre and Film Festival Skena up', Pristina
8.	TV promo Skena Up contains HIV/AIDS awareness raising message and UN-AIDS logo;
9.	12.000 brochures printed and distributed during the International Documentary Film Festival "Doku Fest"  Prizren


International Festival of Youth Musicians "Dam" Pristina 
10.	TV promo for DAM fest contains HIV/AIDS awareness raising message and UNAIDS logo;
11.	5.000 brochures printed and distributed during Dam festival 
12.	5.000 brochures distributed through daily Koha Ditore 


International Documentary and short Film Festival "Doku Fest"
13.	TV promo for Docu fest contains HIV/AIDS awareness raising message and UNAIDS logo;
14.	12.000 brochures printed and distributed during the International Documentary Film Festival "Doku Fest"  Prizren
15.	Four award winning short films form the 48 Hours Video Fest short movies presented in Docufest followed by a panel discussion.

"Theatre based peer education among Roma, Ashkali and Egyptian population"
16.	Four days of Y-Peer theatre based Peer education training taking place in Kosovo;
17.	30 youngsters and 7 regional performances will be created;
18.	20 monitoring days of performance preparations to be implemented in 7 selected Kosovo municipalities (Gjakova, Ferizaj, Prizren, Prishtina, Plemetina, Mitrovica and Fushe Kosova)
19.	REA Youth Special Edition on HIV/AIDS National Theatre for Social Changes" December 20011
20.	Three best theatre plays awarded with high media coverage.

project_descr: Reducing HIV Vulnerability among youth in Kosovo
